sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { QRCodeSVG } from 'qrcode.react'; const Invoice = () => { const location = useLocation(); const booking = location.state || {}; const userEmail = localStorage.getItem('userEmail'); // Default QR code data if no booking exists const defaultQrData = 'https://sarkariibuss.com/Ba.2Kha9704'; const qrData = booking.invoiceNumber ? JSON.stringify({ billNo: booking.invoiceNumber, date: booking.date, email: userEmail, seats: booking.selectedSeats?.join(', '), from: `${booking.from}, ${booking.fromState}`, to: `${booking.to}, ${booking.toState}`, busName: booking.busName, busId: booking.busId, amount: booking.paymentDetails?.amount }) : defaultQrData; return (
{/* Print button */}
{/* Invoice content */}
{/* Header */}

SarkariiBUSS

Your Trusted Travel Partner

{/* Ticket Details */}

Bus Ticket

From

{booking.from}

{booking.fromState}

To

{booking.to}

{booking.toState}

Date

{booking.date}

Bus Type

{booking.busType || 'Deluxe AC Sleeper'}

Bus Name

{booking.busName || 'Express Travels'}

Bus ID: {booking.busId}

Timings

Departure: {booking.departureTime}

Arrival: {booking.arrivalTime}

{/* Booking Details */}

Booking Details

Bill No.: {booking.invoiceNumber}

Date: {booking.date}

Email: {userEmail}

From: {booking.from}, {booking.fromState}

To: {booking.to}, {booking.toState}

Bus Name: {booking.busName}

Bus ID: {booking.busId}

Dept. Time: {booking.departureTime}

Arrival Time: {booking.arrivalTime}

Seat No.: {booking.selectedSeats?.join(', ')}

Total Passenger: {booking.selectedSeats?.length} Only

Total Price: NPR {booking.paymentDetails?.amount}

{/* Footer */}

Important Notes:

  • Please arrive at least 30 minutes before departure time.
  • Carry a valid ID proof during the journey.
  • No refund on cancellation within 2 hours of departure.
  • For any assistance, call our 24/7 helpline: 1800-123-4567
); }; export default Invoice;
